# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference**: WS3580651020
* **Solicitation Reference**: WS3580651020
* **Publication Date**: September 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 13, 2022, 14:00:00 EDT
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Project Description

The Government of Canada invites proposals for the supply and delivery of one land roller for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's (AAFC) Lethbridge, Alberta location. The government requires a new land roller with a preference for Canadian goods.

## Contract Details

* **Contract Start Date**: September 6, 2022
* **Contract End Date**: June 16, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Evaluation Criteria

The government will evaluate proposers based on the ** Lowest Price**.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Wiebe, Lyland
* **Contact Email**: lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents

Please follow the tender notice on SAP Ariba: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14051767 for the full tender package and instruction.

**AMENDMENT NOTICE**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 13, 2022, 14:00:00 EDT. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
